name: Spiral Rush Go
description:
Spiral Rush Go has an addictive gameplay with crazy bouncing ball and colorful spots helix. Download and play the super addictive helix game to spend your leisure time.

How to Play?
-- Slide the fingers right and left for the helix rotation and jump of the ball. Try to avoid the various obstacles and let the ball pass.
-- Do not miss your jump - do not fall off the edge!
-- You can bounce the ball more times to select the right way to the bottom.
-- Beat your score and compete with others to reach the best score in the world!

Game Features：
-- One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
-- Easy game to play with one-touch controls
-- Beautiful helix tower labyrinth graphics
-- Level up and unlock new chapters.
-- Challenge with your friends and have fun.

Download Spiral Rush Go and enjoy the addictive gameplay!
